title: Executive Order 5050-Authorizing the Appointment of Samuel H. Thompson Without Regard to Civil Service Rules
content: Mr. Samuel H. Thompson may be appointed to an appropriate position in or under the Indian Bureau without reference to the civil service rules.
Mr. Thompson has had long service in high grade supervisory positions outside the Government service.
citation: Calvin Coolidge, Executive Order 5050-Authorizing the Appointment of Samuel H. Thompson Without Regard to Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360770
